aima.core.util.math.geom.shapes

Interface IGeometric2D

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle2D, Ellipse2D, Line2D, Polyline2D, Rect2D

    public interface IGeometric2D
    This interface defines functionality that geometric shapes in a two-dimensional Cartesian plot have to implement.
    If pre-calculations can speed up the functions isInside,isInsideBorder and rayCast these calculations should be made.
    The reason being that these functions will be called more frequently than the constructor of the shapes.
    Author:
    Arno von Borries, Jan Phillip Kretzschmar, Andreas Walscheid

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Rect2D getBounds()
      Gets the boundaries of this geometric shape as a Rect2D.
      boolean isInside(Point2D point)
      Tests whether the point is inside this geometric shape excluding its border.
      boolean isInsideBorder(Point2D point)
      Tests whether the point is inside this geometric shape including its border.
      Point2D randomPoint()
      Generates a random point that is on this geometric shape.
      double rayCast(Ray2D ray)
      Intersects this geometric shape with a ray.
      IGeometric2D transform(TransformMatrix2D matrix)
      Calculates a TransformMatrix2D onto this geometric shape.

    • Method Detail

      • randomPoint

        Point2D randomPoint()
        Generates a random point that is on this geometric shape. isInsideBorder() has to return true for that point.
        Returns:
        a new random point inside the shape.

      • isInside

        boolean isInside(Point2D point)
        Tests whether the point is inside this geometric shape excluding its border.
        Parameters:
        point - the point to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the point is inside the shape.

      • isInsideBorder

        boolean isInsideBorder(Point2D point)
        Tests whether the point is inside this geometric shape including its border.
        Parameters:
        point - the point to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the point is inside the shape or on its border.

      • rayCast

        double rayCast(Ray2D ray)
        Intersects this geometric shape with a ray.
        Parameters:
        ray - the ray to intersect.
        Returns:
        the length of the ray until it intersects with this shape. Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if it does not intersect this shape.

      • getBounds

        Rect2D getBounds()
        Gets the boundaries of this geometric shape as a Rect2D.
        Returns:
        the boundaries of this shape.

      • transform

        IGeometric2D transform(TransformMatrix2D matrix)
        Calculates a TransformMatrix2D onto this geometric shape.
        Parameters:
        matrix - the transformation matrix that gets calculated into this shape.
        Returns:
        the transformed shape.
